description:
At first glance, Kunitsu-Gami: Path Of The Goddess feels like the spinning plates metaphor made manifest. Each stage requires you to purge supernatural rot, rescue villagers, build traps, and fight off waves of hideous demons, all with the goal of aiding a divine maiden in her quest to rid Mt. Kafuku of a plague. The gameplay mechanics required to achieve all of those tasks, however, bundle together to create one of the more distinct experiences in video games this year. 

#gaming #KumitsuGami #gamespot
title: Kunitsu-Gami: Path Of The Goddess GameSpot Review

description:
With well received Resident Evil remakes, the strong numbers on Street Fighter and Monster Hunter, as well as rolling the dice on new ideas like Kunitsu-Gami: Path of the Goddess, Capcom is really having a moment. Tam and Lucy discuss what the future could bring. 

#gaming #capcom #gamespot
title: It's A Good Time To Be A Capcom Fan | Spot On

title: Concord Doesn't Explain This IMPORTANT Mechanic

description:
This is the day you will always remember as the day you joined Cursed Sails.

Complete quests to earn Cursed Gold and progress through the rewards track! The free rewards track has all you need to tame the tides. Choose the Upgraded rewards track and you’ll unlock Captain Jack Sparrow and other nautical items to keep you afloat!

Play Fortnite Battle Royale, the completely free 100-player PvP mode. One giant map, A Battle Bus, Last one standing wins. ESRB Rating: Teen with Violence.
title: Fortnite - Official Pirates Of The Caribbean Cinematic Trailer

description:
Inflict the Emperor’s wrath upon the enemies of the Imperium with the Heavy Bolter!

Tear through the Tyranid swarms with its enormous clip and devastating shells on September 9, when #SpaceMarine2 releases on PS5, Xbox Series X|S and PC.
title: Space Marine 2 - Official Heavy Bolter Weapon Gameplay Trailer
